doc.name: iphoneDeviceScale
doc.summary: Returns the scale of the device's screen(relative to a non-Retina display)

description.overview: Use the iphoneDeviceScale function to find the scale of the device's screen (relative to a non-Retinal display)
description.value:
The iphoneDeviceScale function returns
* 2 on a retina display
* 1 otherwise
description.comments: The iphoneDeviceScale function returns the scale of the device's screen (relative to a non-Retinal display), this is 2 on a retina display and 1 otherwise.
